languages.text: "Ты неплохо подкован{mf||а} в нюансах организации Инквизиции, {name}. Да, изначально наше прибытие в Простор Коронус было продиктовано необходимостью борьбы с ксеносами. Более того — культ косвенно связан с моей основной специализацией. Возможно, позже я смогу открыть тебе всю истину, но пока что попрошу набраться терпения и смирения".

"You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."
languages.original_text: "Ты неплохо подкован{mf||а} в нюансах организации Инквизиции, {name}. Да, изначально наше прибытие в Простор Коронус было продиктовано необходимостью борьбы с ксеносами. Более того — культ косвенно связан с моей основной специализацией. Возможно, позже я смогу открыть тебе всю истину, но пока что попрошу набраться терпения и смирения".

traits.locale_text: "You are pretty well versed in how the Inquisition is organized, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in Koronus was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more, the Cult is tangentially related to my main specialization. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth some day, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

"You are pretty well versed in how the Inquisition is organized, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in Koronus was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more, the Cult is tangentially related to my main specialization. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth some day, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

But there is more — the Cult is tangentially related to my main specialization. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

"You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organized, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the Cult is tangentially related to my main specialization. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

"You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the Cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

languages.text: «Veo que conoce bien la organización de la Inquisición, {name}. Sí, al principio nuestra llegada a la Extensión de Koronus fue motivada por la necesidad de hacer frente a los xenos. Pero hay más: el Culto tiene cierta relación con mi especialidad principal. Tal vez más adelante pueda revelarle toda la verdad, pero por ahora solo puedo pedirle humildad y paciencia».
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que conoce bien la organización de la Inquisición, {name}. Sí, al principio nuestra llegada a la Extensión de Koronus fue motivada por la necesidad de hacer frente a los xenos. Pero hay más: el Culto tiene cierta relación con mi especialidad principal. Tal vez más adelante pueda revelarle toda la verdad, pero por ahora solo puedo pedirle humildad y paciencia».

languages.text: “你对审判庭的组织结构非常熟悉，{name}。没错，我们一开始来到科罗努斯扩区是为了对付异形，但不仅如此。邪教相关的事务，与我的主要专长有着密切关联。或许某一天，我会告诉你事情的全部真相，但就目前而言，我希望你能表现出谦逊与耐心。”
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: “你对审判庭的组织结构非常熟悉，{name}。没错，我们一开始来到科罗努斯星域是为了对付异形，但不仅如此。邪教相关的事务，与我的主要专长有着密切关联。或许某一天，我会告诉你事情的全部真相，但就目前而言，我希望你能表现出谦逊与耐心。”

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の内部事情をよくおわかりですね、{name}さん。そう、当初我らがコロヌス・エクスパンスに足を踏み入れたのは、異種族と戦うためでした。だけどそれだけではない。教団は我の専門と深く関係があるんですよ。いつか全てを話せるときがくると思いますが、今はじっと我慢していただければ助かります」
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の内部事情をよくおわかりですね、{name}さん。そう、当初我らがコロヌス・エクスパンスに足を踏み入れたのは、異種族と戦うためでした。だけどそれだけではない。教団は我の専門と深く関係があるんですよ。いつか全てを話せるときがくると思いますが、今はじっと我慢していただければ助かります」

languages.text: "Ihr seid recht beschlagen, was die Organisation der Inquisition angeht, {name}. Ja, anfangs stand unsere Gegenwart in der Koronus-Ausdehnung ganz im Zeichen der Bekämpfung von Xenos. Aber das ist längst nicht alles ... der Kult hat indirekt mit meinem Spezialgebiet zu tun. Vielleicht kann ich Euch eines Tages die ganze Wahrheit verraten, aber im Augenblick bitte ich Euch nur um Demut und Geduld."
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid recht beschlagen, was die Organisation der Inquisition angeht, {name}. Ja, anfangs stand unsere Gegenwart in der Koronus Expanse ganz im Zeichen der Bekämpfung von Xenos. Aber das ist längst nicht alles ... der Kult hat indirekt mit meinem Spezialgebiet zu tun. Vielleicht kann ich Euch eines Tages die ganze Wahrheit verraten, aber im Augenblick bitte ich Euch nur um Demut und Geduld."

languages.text: « Je vois que vous en savez long sur l'organisation de l'Inquisition, {name}. Il est vrai que notre venue dans les Étendues de Koronus était à l'origine dictée par la nécessité de lutter contre les xénos, mais ce n'est pas tout : ce culte est plus ou moins lié à ma spécialisation principale. Je pourrai peut-être vous révéler toute la vérité un jour, mais pour le moment, je vous demande de faire preuve d'humilité et de patience. »
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous en savez long sur l'organisation de l'Inquisition, {name}. Il est vrai que notre venue dans les Étendues de Koronus était à l'origine dictée par la nécessité de lutter contre les xénos, mais ce n'est pas tout : ce culte est plus ou moins lié à ma spécialisation principale. Je pourrai peut-être vous révéler toute la vérité un jour, mais pour le moment, je vous demande de faire preuve d'humilité et de patience. »

languages.text: "Engizisyon'un organizasyon şekli konusunda bilgi sahibisin {name}. Evet, Koronus Enginliği'ne asıl geliş sebebimiz, zenolarla savaşma ihtiyacının doğmuş olmasıydı. Fakat dahası var: Tarikat bir nevi asıl uzmanlık alanımla bağlantılı. Belki bir gün tüm gerçeği anlatmam mümkün olur, şimdilik senden tevazu ve sabır rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are well versed in how the Inquisition is organised, {name}. Yes, initially our arrival in the Koronus Expanse was dictated by the need to fight xenos. But there is more — the cult is tangentially related to my main specialisation. Perhaps I will be able to reveal the full truth someday, but right now I ask you to display humility and patience."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon'un organizasyon şekli konusunda bilgi sahibisin {name}. Evet, Koronus Enginliği'ne asıl geliş sebebimiz, zenolarla savaşma ihtiyacının doğmuş olmasıydı. Fakat dahası var: Tarikat bir nevi asıl uzmanlık alanımla bağlantılı. Belki bir gün tüm gerçeği anlatmam mümkün olur, şimdilik senden tevazu ve sabır rica ediyorum."
